command.name: CMHD
command.title: Hold Command
command.description:
Holds the given X-Plane command(s) until terminated.
In X-Plane API this corresponds to `XPLMCommandBegin` with `XPLMCommandEnd` only sent on `TERM` or disconnect. X-Plane (on its own) will continuously issue trigger events while being held.
Note that XPRC command termination may be acknowledged before actual release of the X-Plane command being held.

parameters.parameter:
command name
Providing multiple command names will cause them to be held and released within the same frames. All commands begin to be held in the specified order and will be released in reverse order.

responses.response: status * If any command cannot be found: `ERR` * Otherwise: `ACK`
